entry.title: WIND WARNING , Mont-Joli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 2:37 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: E 46 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening then to flurries overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm inland. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming south 40 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
